__e: I dreamt I was asleep in the street, and a young man came.
But I went into your mother's room and you were sleeping in her arms.
As long as it's not about... why I was sleeping in my car earlier.
No, Michael, I don't just sleep all day.
Last night till this morning, while I was sleeping, I can't account for it, a gap in my consciousness, and somehow he...
I-I know what you're thinking, but I wasn't really asleep.
I am not just getting home. I couldn't sleep so I went for a walk.
Maybe you're not sleeping in the bed with me.
I told my mom I was staying at your house.
I told my folks I was sleeping at your place.
Did you tell your Dad that you were staying over my house last night?
I promised not to tell anyone you were staying here, and I didn't.
Well, obviously, I've been sleeping here at night, but I've been gone during the day.
I told her I'm sleeping here tonight.
But I remember when I was a kid I used to sleep with my brother Harry when I was 7 or 8.
If only I had had it... when I was sleeping with my brother in the corridor.
Is it true you slept with your mother in her bed?
